WorkItem.Description:
I have recently updated to the newest version for rawr wpf 4.2.0
i have windows 64 and use chrome.
i get this error on trying to uplaod new character from battle.net and am unable to load off ej site either it just keeps saying processing and nothing else.
 
no fix was suggested
the stack trace is as follows:
at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)
WorkItem.Summary: The remote server returned an error: (500) Internal Server Error.

Comments.Message: Can you give the character info you're trying to load?

I have the same problem, and i have change the head slot to Flickering Cowl of the flameblaze, i have see that the stats are incorrect from the base in rawr, have use upgrade from wowhead and then it disapers from base rawr, then i put on the old head Power Generator Hood and dont have any problem with rawr but the new head dont see on the base rawr.

I put the new head  Cowl of the flameblaze, load from rawr addon or battel.net and rawr crash, when i use the old head  Power Generator Hood rawr functionally good.

the diference at the Cowl of the flameblaze in the base rawr are diferente stats from de game


Error en el servidor remoto: (500) Error interno del servidor.
